articles.title: King Charles 'doing his best' after prostate treatment, says Camilla - BBC.com
articles.description: The Queen gave an update on the King's health during a working visit to the Royal Free Hospital.
articles.content:
By Emily AtkinsonBBC News
Queen Camilla said she would pass on well-wishes to the King
King Charles is "doing his best" after hospital treatment for an enlarged prostate, Queen Camilla has said.
